message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product for sale. I think you'll really like it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $150 is a bit steep. Would you be willing to consider a price of $110?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can see you're willing to pay $110, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $130?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $120. Would you be willing to consider a price of $120?
